mapper.update: update sys_role set deleted_at=now() where id=#{roleId}
mapper.select: select r.id, r.name, r.name_zh, r.created_at, r.updated_at from sys_user_role ur left join sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.id where (ur.user_id = #{roleId} and r.deleted_at is null)

select m.id, m.name, m.parent_id, m.level, m.sort, m.icon, m.hidden, m.created_at, m.updated_at from sys_role_menu rm inner join sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.id where (rm.role_id = #{roleId} and m.deleted_at is null)
select r.id, r.name, r.url, r.created_at, r.updated_at from sys_role_resource rr inner join sys_resource r on rr.resource_id = r.id where (rr.role_id = #{roleId} and deleted_at is null)
